challenge: Start drinking at the same time as the person to your left. Don't stop until they do.
Pour some of your drink in the center cup.
Ask someone a questions. That persons then asks someone else a question. The first person to fail drinks.
Play never have i ever
Choose a category of things. The person to your right names something in that category. The first person to fail drinks.
Say a word. The person to your right says a word that rhymes. The first person to fail drinks.
Choose someone to be your mate. Any time you drink, they drink.
Raise your hand to heaven. The last person to do so drinks.
Girls drink.
Guys drink.
The last person to touch the floor drinks.
You drink
Choose someone to drink
